channel.title: Release Notes - 2023 on Releases - aspose.com
channel.description: Recent content in Release Notes - 2023 on Releases - aspose.com

item.title: Aspose.BarCode for Cpp 23.12 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.BarCode for C++ 23.12. Please also check CodePorting.Native Cs2Cpp 23.12 release notes. All Changes Key Summary Category BARCODENET-37365 Add Multithreading to Postal processors Enhancement Public API changes and backwards compatibility No API changes Upcoming API changes In our next release coming in January 2024, we plan to launch a big update for our QualitySettings API.

item.title: Aspose.BarCode for Cpp 23.10 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.BarCode for C++ 23.10. Please also check CodePorting.Native Cs2Cpp 23.10 release notes. All Changes Key Summary Category BARCODENET-38674 Add GS1MicroPdf417 with special GS1 modes Enhancement BARCODENET-38674 Add reading GS1MicroPdf417 with special GS1 modes Enhancement Public API changes and backwards compatibility Code128Emulation type was removed. Aspose::BarCode::Generation::Pdf417Parameters::get_Code128Emulation() property getter was removed. Aspose::BarCode::Generation::Pdf417Parameters::set_Code128Emulation() property setter was removed.

item.title: Aspose.BarCode for Cpp 23.11 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.BarCode for C++ 23.11. Please also check CodePorting.Native Cs2Cpp 23.11 release notes. All Changes Key Summary Category BARCODENET-38683 Improve Han Xin Code support Enhancement BARCODENET-38792 Improve speeds of basic recognition components Enhancement BARCODENET-38673 Investigate unstable test for DotCode recognition Bug BARCODENET-37127 Improve QR recognition quality Enhancement Public API changes and backwards compatibility In this release recognition performance for Han Xin and QR symbologies was improved.

item.title: Aspose.BarCode for Cpp 23.9 Release Notes

All Changes Key Summary Category BARCODENET-38749 Swiss QR barcode: wrong placement of cross Bug BARCODENET-38709 Unable to read DataMatrix code Bug BARCODENET-38711 Improve Aztec barcode recognition quality Enhancement BARCODENET-38753 Optimize searching for zebra segments in Han Xin Code Enhancement Public API changes and backwards compatibility No API changes.

item.title: Aspose.BarCode for Cpp 23.4 Release Notes
